item.title: Alessandro Veracchi
item.description:
Currently I am a Java and Python developer and software marketer at the IT company I founded in Perugia with a my friend in 2010, Evonove. Evonove was a new start point, changing my way to look at IT world completely. We make little jewels, shining and functional: to make people happy.

I founded Python User Group of Perugia. There, I met wonderful people, who share with me passion on IT. Now they work with me in Evonove. I have a degree in Computer Engineering, but that was many years ago. Now I’m a simple Executive Chef in Evonove :)

item.title: Emanuele Palazzetti
item.description:
I’m a software developer but, first of all, fan and supporter of everything turns around computer science, security and open source. I’m very enthusiastic of Python language which became my first choice during implementation phase of a project.

Even if Java was my old used language, I’ve never completely abandoned it and, nowadays, I used it during Android application development. My passions for programming, led me to take part as an active user on many association like LUG and GDG.

item.title: Andrea Veracchi
item.description:
I’ve always been a fan of economics. In 2012 I joined Evonove, and since then I take care of their administrative department.

Evonove is a young and vibrant, it’s a pleasure to be a part of the decisions taken for its development.

item.title: Federico Frenguelli
item.description: Guess I should insert a bio … but I have no time to waste!

item.title: Massimiliano Pippi
item.description:
Software developer, Python lover, Dad.

I write Python and C++ code, maintain servers and services up and running, deploy web applications, integrate software components, write documentation, help making decisions about tools and technologies. I would definitely define myself as a troubleshooter.

As a long-time vegetarian, I currently hold the Vegan Chef position at Evonove.
